akas: Hjerteflimmer: Pigerne mod drengene Denmark (alternative title)
akas from release info: Hjerteflimmer: Pigerne mod drengene Denmark (alternative title)
imdb.plot outline: A game show in which the boys and the girls of a late-teen school class compete against each other. Each team is helped by a celebrity team captain who helps them answer questions about love and sex, including revelations about their classmates' love lives. Back at the school, a girl and a boy is given a practical challenge.
imdb.title: Pigerne mod drengene
plot: The boys and the girls from a school class compete on knowledge about love and sex.::Peter Brandt Nielsen

A game show in which the boys and the girls of a late-teen school class compete against each other. Each team is helped by a celebrity team captain who helps them answer questions about love and sex, including revelations about their classmates' love lives. Back at the school, a girl and a boy is given a practical challenge.::Peter Brandt Nielsen
